Label.en: This painting was originally supposed to be sent to Louis’ grandson Philip, the new King of Spain
Label.fr: Ce tableau devait à l'origine être envoyé au petit-fils de Louis, Philippe, le nouveau roi d'Espagne
Label.es: This painting was originally supposed to be sent to Louis’ grandson Philip, the new King of Spain

Label.en: The artist, Hyacinthe Rigaud, painted Philip, too! It seems this pose was rather fashionable at the time
Label.fr: L'artiste, Hyacinthe Rigaud, a également peint Philippe ! Il semble que cette pose était plutôt à la mode à l'époque
Label.es: The artist, Hyacinthe Rigaud, painted Philip, too! It seems this pose was rather fashionable at the time

Label.en: Well, Louis actually liked his portrait so much that he ordered Rigaud to send a copy to Philip instead, and kept the original!
Label.fr: Eh bien, Louis a tellement aimé son portrait qu'il a demandé à Rigaud d'envoyer une copie à Philippe, et il a gardé l'original !
Label.es: Well, Louis actually liked his portrait so much that he ordered Rigaud to send a copy to Philip instead, and kept the original!

Label.en: Apparently, the painting took a particularly long time to make, since Louis’ gout meant that he had to keep sitting down for breaks
Label.fr: Apparemment, la peinture a été très longue à réaliser : la maladie de la goutte l'obligeait à prendre des pauses pour s'asseoir
Label.es: Apparently, the painting took a particularly long time to make, since Louis’ gout meant that he had to keep sitting down for breaks

Label.en: I guess he can be forgiven… he was over sixty, after all!
Label.fr: Je suppose qu'on peut lui pardonner... Il avait plus de soixante ans après tout
Label.es: I guess he can be forgiven… he was over sixty, after all!
